name: Corinth
description:
Game Jam Theme: Mythology

Inspired by ancient Greek black figure vases, Corinth (named after the city where the first Greek black figure vase was found) is an endless runner set on one of these vases. The vase continuously rotates, revealing new dangers that you will have to avoid.

Created by Rebecca Ansems & Alex McCallum for Dalhousie
University's Computer Science Society's 2016 Winter Game Jam

Controls:

Left click - Start game, jump
Right click - Restart game, duck
Escape - Quit game
